verses.verse: And I, brothers, <S%G80><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> not speak <S%G2980><s%> to you as to spiritual, <S%G4152><s%> but as to carnal, <S%G4559><s%> even as to babes <S%G3516><s%> in Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I have <S%G2192><s%> fed <S%G4222><s%> you with milk, <S%G1051><s%> and not with meat: <S%G1033><s%> for till now <S%G3768><s%> you were not able <S%G1410><s%> to bear it, neither <S%G235><s%> <S%G3777><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> are you able. <S%G1410><s%>

For you are yet <S%G2089><s%> carnal: <S%G4559><s%> for whereas <S%G3699><s%> there is among <S%G1722><s%> you envying, <S%G2205><s%> and strife, <S%G2054><s%> and divisions, <S%G1370><s%> are you not carnal, <S%G4559><s%> and walk <S%G4043><s%> as men? <S%G444><s%>
For while <S%G3752><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> of Paul; and another, <S%G2087><s%> I am of Apollos; <S%G625><s%> are you not carnal? <S%G4559><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> is Paul, and who <S%G5101><s%> is Apollos, <S%G625><s%> but ministers <S%G1249><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> you believed, <S%G4100><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as the Lord <S%G2962><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to every <S%G1538><s%> man?
I have <S%G2192><s%> planted, <S%G5452><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> watered; <S%G4222><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> gave the increase. <S%G837><s%>

So <S%G5620><s%> then neither <S%G3777><s%> is he that plants <S%G5452><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing, neither <S%G3777><s%> he that waters; <S%G4222><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> that gives the increase. <S%G837><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> he that plants <S%G5452><s%> and he that waters <S%G4222><s%> are one: <S%G1520><s%> and every <S%G1538><s%> man shall receive <S%G2983><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his own <S%G2398><s%> labor. <S%G2873><s%>
For we are laborers <S%G4904><s%> together <S%G4904><s%> with God: <S%G2316><s%> you are God's <S%G2316><s%> husbandry, <S%G1091><s%> you are God's <S%G2316><s%> building. <S%G3619><s%>

According <S%G2596><s%> to the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> to me, as a wise <S%G4680><s%> master builder, <S%G753><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> laid <S%G5087><s%> the foundation, <S%G2310><s%> and another <S%G243><s%> builds <S%G2026><s%> thereon. <S%G2026><s%> But let every <S%G1538><s%> man take heed <S%G991><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he builds <S%G2026><s%> thereupon. <S%G2026><s%>

For other <S%G243><s%> foundation <S%G2310><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> lay <S%G5087><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> that is laid, <S%G5087><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man build <S%G2026><s%> on this <S%G5126><s%> foundation <S%G2310><s%> gold, <S%G5557><s%> silver, <S%G696><s%> precious <S%G5093><s%> stones, <S%G3037><s%> wood, <S%G3586><s%> hay, <S%G5528><s%> stubble; <S%G2562><s%>

Every <S%G1538><s%> man's work <S%G2041><s%> shall be made <S%G1096><s%> manifest: <S%G5318><s%> for the day <S%G2250><s%> shall declare <S%G1213><s%> it, because <S%G3754><s%> it shall be revealed <S%G601><s%> by fire; <S%G4442><s%> and the fire <S%G4442><s%> shall try <S%G1381><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> man's work <S%G2041><s%> of what <S%G3697><s%> sort <S%G3697><s%> it is.

If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man's work <S%G2041><s%> abide <S%G3306><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he has built <S%G2026><s%> thereupon, <S%G2026><s%> he shall receive <S%G2983><s%> a reward. <S%G3408><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man's work <S%G2041><s%> shall be burned, <S%G2618><s%> he shall suffer <S%G2210><s%> loss: <S%G2210><s%> but he himself <S%G846><s%> shall be saved; <S%G4982><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> as by fire. <S%G4442><s%>
Know <S%G1492><s%> you not that you are the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and that the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> dwells <S%G3611><s%> in you?

If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man defile <S%G5351><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> him shall God <S%G2316><s%> destroy; <S%G5351><s%> for the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is holy, <S%G40><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> temple you are.

Let no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> deceive <S%G1818><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man among <S%G1722><s%> you seems <S%G1380><s%> to be wise <S%G4680><s%> in this <S%G5129><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> let him become <S%G1096><s%> a fool, <S%G3474><s%> that he may be wise. <S%G4680><s%>

For the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> is foolishness <S%G3472><s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%> For it is written, <S%G1125><s%> He takes <S%G1405><s%> the wise <S%G4680><s%> in their own craftiness. <S%G3834><s%>
And again, <S%G3825><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> the thoughts <S%G1261><s%> of the wise, <S%G4680><s%> that they are vain. <S%G3152><s%>
Therefore <S%G5620><s%> let no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> in men. <S%G444><s%> For all <S%G3956><s%> things are your's; <S%G5216><s%>

Whether <S%G1535><s%> Paul, or <S%G1535><s%> Apollos, <S%G625><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> Cephas, <S%G2786><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> things present, <S%G1764><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> things to come; <S%G3195><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> are your's; <S%G5216><s%>
And you are Christ's; <S%G5547><s%> and Christ <S%G5547><s%> is God's. <S%G2316><s%>
